This endpoint pulls basic statistics of the Fantasy 5 numbers. For each ball (denoted firstNumber, secondNumber, thirdNumber, fourthNumber, fifthNumber) this endpoint returns the mean, median, mode, min, max, standard deviation, variance, skewness, and kurtosis. After which, the endpoint returns the number of occurrences of each number over the life of game.

api_list.api_description:
This is a legacy and free IP checked. We provide a simply non-json style response to requests. Responses are cached for 7 days. 

Check out our Documentation for more information.

Responses will be (Y,E,N):

(Y) : Yes, we have determined the IP address to be used by either or multiple of the following: Cloud, Hosting, Tor, Proxy. 

(E) : Error, something has gone wrong with the request.

(N) : No, we have determined the IP address to be NOT used by any of the following: Cloud, Hosting, Tor, Proxy.

Using the GET method you can request an IP specific detections, and other IP information.

Check out our documentation for more info on our different detections.

Note: This will work only with singular IP lookups.

If you are unkeen to lookup multiple IP addresses at the same time, and want a simpler request. This might be for you. 

We will return a singular IP object, that will minimize your request complexity, but with the loss of flexibility.

query: I'm planning to set up a user front-end for my website. Can you determine if the IP address 288.288.288.288 is associated with any cloud, hosting, Tor, or proxy services? Please also suggest any necessary actions based on the detection results.

api_list.api_description:
This is a legacy and free IP checked. We provide a simply non-json style response to requests. Responses are cached for 7 days. 

Check out our Documentation for more information.

(E) : Error, something has gone wrong with the request.

(N) : No, we have determined the IP address to be NOT used by any of the following: Cloud, Hosting, Tor, Proxy.

Using the GET method you can request an IP specific detections, and other IP information.

Check out our documentation for more info on our different detections.

Note: This will work only with singular IP lookups.

If you are unkeen to lookup multiple IP addresses at the same time, and want a simpler request. This might be for you. 

We will return a singular IP object, that will minimize your request complexity, but with the loss of flexibility.

query: I'm concerned about the security of my family's website. Can you check if the IP address 288.288.288.288 is detected as a cloud, hosting, Tor, or proxy service? Also, suggest any necessary actions based on the detection results.

Example: US/Eastern, US/Pacific, Europe/London

required_parameters.description: The value of webID returned in .../products/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: Sort
optional_parameters.description: One of the followings : LastApprovedAnswerSubmissionTime:desc|LastApprovedAnswerSubmissionTime:asc|SubmissionTime:desc|SubmissionTime:asc

optional_parameters.name: Offset
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: Limit
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

api_list.api_description: Get detail information of specific product

required_parameters.name: webID
required_parameters.description: The value of webID returned in .../products/list endpoint

api_list.api_description: List reviews relating to a product

required_parameters.name: ProductId
required_parameters.description: The value of webID returned in .../products/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: Limit
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: Sort
optional_parameters.description: One of the followings : SubmissionTime:asc|SubmissionTime:desc|Rating:asc|Rating:desc|Helpfulness:asc|Helpfulness:desc|HasPhotos:asc|HasPhotos:desc|HasVideos:asc|HasVideos:desc

optional_parameters.name: Offset
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

api_list.api_description: List products with options and filters

optional_parameters.name: dimensionValueID
optional_parameters.description: The value of payload/dimensions/dimensionValues/currentDimensionId JSON object returned right in this endpoint. Pass this parameter several times to filter by multiple options. Ex : ...&dimensionValueID=AgeAppropriate:Teens&dimensionValueID=Size:TWIN...

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: keyword
optional_parameters.description: Any term or phrase to look for relating products. Ex : bikini top

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose, starting from 1

optional_parameters.name: sortID
optional_parameters.description: The value of payload/sorts/ID JSON object returned right in this endpoint.

api_list.api_description: Get suggestions by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with

query: I'm redecorating my home and looking for furniture options. Can you list the available furniture products on Kohls? Also, provide me with the product reviews for a specific product with webID 5372023.

api_list.api_description: List categories and their recursive children categories if available

required_parameters.name: caid
required_parameters.description: The value of categoryId fields returned right in this endpoint. The default root category is 214970.

api_list.api_description: List reviews relating to specific product

required_parameters.name: sku
required_parameters.description: The value of sku fields returned in .../products/list or .../products/search endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: star
optional_parameters.description: Leave empty or  1 to 5

optional_parameters.name: sort_order
optional_parameters.description: One of the following : RELEVANCE|HELPFUL|DATE_ASCENDING|DATE_DESCENDING|IMAGE|RATING_DESCENDING|RATING_ASCENDING

api_list.api_description: List products with filters and options

required_parameters.name: categoryId
required_parameters.description: The value of categoryId fields returned in .../categories/list endpoint

optional_parameters.name: currentZipCode
optional_parameters.description: The postal code to get near available products.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: itemsPerPage
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: sortId
optional_parameters.description: Check availableSorts field returned right in this endpoint for suitable sortId

optional_parameters.name: filterStringUnencoded
optional_parameters.description: The value of filterStringUnencoded fields returned right in this endpoint to filter products, pass this parameter multiple times for multiple filters. Ex : ...&filterStringUnencoded=a1234567890~2147483646&filterStringUnencoded=at_style~Tiffany&...

api_list.api_description: Search for products by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: keyword
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase to look for relating products

optional_parameters.name: filters
optional_parameters.description: The value of filter_string_unencoded fields returned right in this endpoint to filter products, pass this parameter multiple times for multiple filters. Ex : ...&filters=colorList~White&filters=masterClID~180&...

optional_parameters.name: curpage
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: itemsperpage
optional_parameters.description: For paging purpose

optional_parameters.name: sortby
optional_parameters.description: The value of sort_value fields returned right in this endpoint. Default is 0

api_list.api_description: Get detail information of specific product

required_parameters.name: sku
required_parameters.description: The value of sku fields returned in .../products/list or .../products/search endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: wfProductOptions
optional_parameters.description: The value of id fields under relevantAttributes JSON object returned right in this endpoint, pass this parameter multiple time for multiple options. Ex : ...&wfProductOptions=1234567890&wfProductOptions=special_offers&...

api_list.api_description: Get auto suggestions by term or phrase

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with

query: I'm a blogger and I want to write a detailed review of a specific product with SKU X005789621. Can you provide me with all the information about this product, including images, pricing, and customer reviews?

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with

query: I'm a blogger and I want to write a detailed review of a specific product with SKU X005789621. Can you provide me with all the information about this productand provide reviews for these products?
My friend is interested in buying a new laptop. Could you fetch the reviews and offers for the product with ID 3OM3PS.
I am looking to buy a new laptop. Can you fetch the search results for 'Mac' on Amazon? Additionally, provide me with the product details, reviews, and offers for the product with ID 3OM3PS.

api_list.api_name: Select Race based on Race Number
api_list.api_description: Returns the details for the race based on the race number for the track in the F1 season.
Returns the race using the ID used in the database for each individual race.
Lists down all the races in the schedule

query: My friends and I are huge F1 fans. We want to attend a race this season. Could you please  provide the race details for the race with the ID d27e0de553b9d7.

api_list.api_name: Select Race based on Race Number
api_list.api_description: Returns the details for the race based on the race number for the track in the F1 season.
Returns the race using the ID used in the database for each individual race.
Lists down all the races in the schedule

query: I am a racing enthusiast and I want to plan a trip to watch an F1 race. Please provide me with the race details for the race with the ID d27e0de553b9d7.

api_list.api_name: Get A Specific Champion's Base Stats
api_list.api_description: This endpoint returns the base stats of a specific champion.
This endpoint returns all base stats from every champion in the game.

api_list.api_name: Get List of All Champion Names
api_list.api_description: This endpoint returns a list of all Champion names.

query: I am a League of Legends player and I want to know the base stats of a specific champion. Can you provide me with the base stats for the champion 'raven'?
relevant APIs: Get A Specific Champion's Base Stats

api_list.api_description: Get additional product information / details such as description, about, rating distribution and specs.

required_parameters.name: asin
required_parameters.description:
Product ASIN for which to get details. Supports batching of up to 10 ASINs in a single request, separated by comma (e.g. *B08PPDJWC8,B07ZPKBL9V, B08BHXG144*).

Note that each ASIN in a batch request is counted as a single request against the plan quota.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Sets the marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP`

api_list.api_description: Search for product offers on Amazon with support for multiple filters and options.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Search query. Supports both free-form text queries or a product asin.

optional_parameters.name: brand
optional_parameters.description:
Find products with a specific brand. Multiple brands can be specified as a comma (,) separated list. The brand values can be seen from Amazon's search left filters panel, as seen [here](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=phone).

**e.g.** `SAMSUNG`
**e.g.** `Google,Apple`

optional_parameters.name: min_price
optional_parameters.description: Only return product offers with price greater than a certain value. Specified in the currency of the selected country. For example, in case country=US, a value of *105.34* means *$105.34*.

optional_parameters.name: max_price
optional_parameters.description: Only return product offers with price lower than a certain value. Specified in the currency of the selected country. For example, in case country=US, a value of *105.34* means *$105.34*.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
Sets the marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP`

optional_parameters.name: category_id
optional_parameters.description:
Find products in a specific category / department. Use the **Product Category List** endpoint to get a list of valid categories and their ids for the country specified in the request.

**Default:** `aps` (All Departments)

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description:
Return the results in a specific sort order.

**Default:** `RELEVANCE`

**Allowed values:** `RELEVANCE, LOWEST_PRICE, HIGHEST_PRICE, REVIEWS, NEWEST`

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description:
Results page to return.

**Default:** `1`

query: I am looking to buy a new phone. Can you provide me with the product details for the ASIN B07ZPKBL9V1?

api_list.api_description: Translates input text, returning translated text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: If you don’t know what language the text is written in, our API will detect the language of the original request.

required_parameters.name: toLang
required_parameters.description: The language to use for translation of the input text, set to one of the language codes listed in the overview tab

optional_parameters.name: fromLang
optional_parameters.description: The language of the fromLang, set to one of the language codes listed in Language Support. If the source language is not specified, the API will attempt to detect the source language automatically and return it within the response.

query: I am a language enthusiast and I want to translate a text 'Hello, how are you?' to 'fri' language. Can you help me with this?

api_list.api_description: Get detailed information about a specific day.

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

optional_parameters.name: configuration
optional_parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

api_list.api_description: Add an amount of working time to a given start date/time

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

required_parameters.name: start_time
required_parameters.description: The start time in a 24 hours format with leading zeros.

optional_parameters.name: increment_time
optional_parameters.description: The amount of working time to be added (or removed) to the start date time. Format H:i. This amount cannot exceed 5000 hours. For example, to add one hour: 1:00. To add 30 hours and 15 minutes: 30:15.  To remove 45 minutes: -0:45

optional_parameters.name: configuration
optional_parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

api_list.api_description: Analyse a period (you provide a start_date and an end_date over a given calendar, we respond with the period analysis)

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

optional_parameters.name: end_time
optional_parameters.description: The end date's time (24 hours format, like 09:00 or 15:00, but not 3pm).If omitted, default value is 23:59.

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description: The start date's time (24 hours format, like 09:00 or 15:00, but not 3pm).If omitted, default value is 00:00

optional_parameters.name: configuration
optional_parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

query: I am planning a trip to the US and I want to know if the date '9999-99-99' is a working day in the US. Can you provide me with this information?

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

optional_parameters.name: end_time
optional_parameters.description: The end date's time (24 hours format, like 09:00 or 15:00, but not 3pm).If omitted, default value is 23:59.

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description: The start date's time (24 hours format, like 09:00 or 15:00, but not 3pm).If omitted, default value is 00:00

optional_parameters.name: configuration
optional_parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

required_parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

required_parameters.name: start_time
required_parameters.description: The start time in a 24 hours format with leading zeros.

optional_parameters.name: increment_time
optional_parameters.description: The amount of working time to be added (or removed) to the start date time. Format H:i. This amount cannot exceed 5000 hours. For example, to add one hour: 1:00. To add 30 hours and 15 minutes: 30:15.  To remove 45 minutes: -0:45

api_list.api_description: Get detailed information about a specific day.

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: The ISO country code (2 letters). See available countries & configurations

optional_parameters.name: configuration
optional_parameters.description: The name of the preset configuration to be used. See available countries & configurations

query: I am planning a trip to the US and I want to know if the period from start date '2013-12-31' to end date '2013-01-31' is a working period in the US. Can you provide me with this information?
question need to be asked: Is the start date '2013-12-31' and end date '2013-01-31' correct?
clarification: The correct start date is '2013-01-01' and end date is '2013-12-31'

query: I am planning a trip to the US and I want to know the date and time after adding 2004 hours to the start date '2013-12-31' and start time '25:15'. Can you provide me with this information?
question need to be asked: Is the start date '2013-12-31' and start time '25:15' correct?
clarification: The correct start date is '2013-12-31' and start time is '08:15'
